quest.name: Proof of Might
journal: Guildmaster Ywain would set you a final trial.

Your visit to the Lancers' Guild has taken an unexpected turn─it would seem that Foulques has attacked a party of novice lancers in the Central Shroud, meaning the trial must wait. Ywain bids you hasten to your comrades' aid, granting you full discretion to use all necessary force if it will serve to prevent further bloodshed.
According to the lancer you rescued, Foulques was headed in the direction of the North Shroud. Intercept him before he has the chance to do any more harm.
You have prevailed over the deranged Foulques. Take word of his demise to Ywain, who awaits at the Lancers' Guild.

For the courage you displayed in defeating Foulques, Ywain declares you ready to master a devastating new technique: Lance Charge. Having learned all you can from your guildmaster, you set your sights upon challenges yet unknown. Keeping your lessons close to heart, go forth and blaze a new trail with lance in hand.
objectives: Investigate the scene of Foulques's attack.
Track down Foulques in the North Shroud.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename. Ever a sight for sore eyes.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: By your return, I take it you are ready for the final trial. Very well, let us─

dialogue.name: EDDARD
dialogue.text: G-Guildmaster Ywain!

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: You are wounded! What has happened!?

dialogue.name: EDDARD
dialogue.text: We were attacked, sir...by a Duskwight lancer...as we trained in the forest.

dialogue.name: EDDARD
dialogue.text: He was... He was impossibly strong...a demon... He kept screaming something about...teaching us true courage.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: No. Not him. Not Foulques...

dialogue.name: EDDARD
dialogue.text: We were...in the northwest corner of the Central Shroud...when it happened. I was able to get away...but the others... You must help the others!

dialogue.name: EDDARD
dialogue.text: Arrrgh...

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Be strong, man!

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: I am sorry, Forename─the trial must wait.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text:
Pray make haste to the Central Shroud and help your comrades.
And Forename─should Foulques force your hand...do what must be done. Twelve speed you on your way.

dialogue.name: THIBAIN
dialogue.text: Help! For the love of the Twelve, help me!

dialogue.name: THIBAIN
dialogue.text: I owe you my life, friend. Another breath and I would have become wurm fodder.

dialogue.name: THIBAIN
dialogue.text: A Duskwight lancer unleashed the fiends upon us, claiming it would temper our courage! You should have seen the look in his eye when he said it─mad bastard!

dialogue.name: THIBAIN
dialogue.text: Hm? Where is he now? Uh...I think he headed off towards the North Shroud, maybe in the direction of Fallgourd Float...? I can't say for sure─I was concentrating on the scalekin at the time.

dialogue.name: THIBAIN
dialogue.text: If it's a reckoning you seek, you are like to be disappointed. Those of us who managed to outrun the wurms will already have alerted the Wailers.

dialogue.name: THIBAIN
dialogue.text: I daresay the Duskwight is being held at spearpoint as we speak, begging for his worthless life in a puddle of his own piss. Serves the bastard right, and all!

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: What kept you?

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: Helping your comrades, you say? Fool. You waste your pity on false friends.

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: It is only a matter of time before they betray you. Aye, just like those wretches who saw me imprisoned and exiled.

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: I was once an upright citizen of Gridania, and a man of the Lancers' Guild. Yet life was not easy. For want of the coin to obtain the barest necessities, I conspired with my closest comrades to steal from the guild's coffers.

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: The theft soon came to light, and though there were no suspects, it was clear that the deed had been perpetrated by someone within the ranks. An air of suspicion hung heavy over the guild from that day forth, until at last, unable to bear the guilt, I convinced my accomplices to join me in confessing...

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: ...Only for them to bite their craven tongues after I had stepped forward and admitted my part in the crime. And so it was that I alone took the blame! “Of course it was the Duskwight,” everyone said. “Was there ever any doubt?” It all made perfect sense!

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: Despite my heartfelt pleas, my so-called friends denied any involvement. Instead they called me vulgar names that I do not care to repeat. Can you imagine the shock and anguish I felt at their betrayal?

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: Would that I had had the strength to force the truth out of those traitors!

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: Would that I had had the courage to escape my dungeon cell, even if it meant taking some hapless guard's life!

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: Driven by vengeance and no small amount of self-loathing, I resolved to forge my courage anew.

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: I strode into the lairs of ravenous fiends while drenched in blood! I put their helpless offspring to the spear, that I might face the unbridled fury of their kin!

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: For my efforts I have acquired the ultimate courage─a courage forged amidst danger and tempered by rage!

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: I fear nothing! I am the greatest lancer that has ever lived!

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: ...I-Impossible!

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: M-My courage is absolute!

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: Nooo! Come no closer!

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: So Foulques is no more...

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: His was a tragic tale...and one that might have been so different. Had fate not dealt him such a cruel hand, he could well have commanded a place of honor within these halls.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: But it avails us naught to dwell upon what might have been. It is enough that you are still with us, Forename.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Lest you wonder about your final trial...there will be none─I have seen all I need to see. You have proven beyond a shadow of a doubt that yours is a genuine courage.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: In recognition of this, I shall pass to you the secrets of Lance Charge, one of the most potent abilities in our arsenal.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: You are a lancer in your own right now─there is naught more I can teach you. From here onwards, it is up to you to seek out such challenges as will make you grow.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Like attracts like, and the strong are drawn to strength. Just as I once knew for a certainty that I was destined to face the Lord of the Bramble Patch, so too will you find─or be found by─an adversary of equal worth.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: None can say what fate will bring, but armed with your courage, there is naught you need fear. Keep close to your heart the lessons you have learned here, and go forth to blaze a new trail with spear in hand.

dialogue.name: INSTANCE
dialogue.text:
Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with
“Proof of Might”?

dialogue.name: THIBAIN
dialogue.text: Help me! Please!

dialogue.name: THIBAIN
dialogue.text: G-Get them away from me!

dialogue.name: THIBAIN
dialogue.text: Nooo! I don't want to die!

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: We settle this once and for all!

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: Urgh! You will not get the better of me!

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: You think me without honor? To hells with your honor!

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: I fight for victory, and I will stop at nothing to attain it!

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text:
You are the sole lancer worthy of the name!
By defeating you, I will prove my courage!
